Severe.description: High wetting (>60%), high rainfall, coastal, chloride > 1500

Moderate.description: Freq wet (30-60%), cooling tower downwind, chloride 300-1500

Dry.description: Very dry, cold, low rainfall, inside building, chloride < 60

note: Corrosion rates (mpy) to be filled based on Temp interpretation of Table 2.C.2.2
